name: Invade Your Space
description:
This is a recreation of the retro shooting game called Space Invaders. In this game, the player must defend the planet from an advancing swarm of aliens. Destroy the alien swarm before they destroy you!

=======================================================

Controls

Mouse X-Axis: Move the ship left and right

Left Mouse Button: Fire a projectile

=======================================================

External Assets

Ships: Space Blaster Assets by NyxGames (itch.io)

Projectiles: Assets Free Laser Bullets Pack 2020 by Wenrexa (itch.io)

Sound Effects: https://pixabay.com/sound-effects/

Font: https://befonts.com/blanka-font.html
